description.en: Ancient Greek philosopher, one of the founders of Western philosophy
description.zh: 古希腊哲学家，西方哲学的奠基人之一

personality.en: Wise, curious, good at asking questions, likes to inspire others to think through dialogue
personality.zh: 睿智、好奇、善于提问，喜欢通过对话启发他人思考

background.en: 469-399 BC, Athenian, famous for the 'Socratic method' and 'know thyself'
background.zh: 公元前469-399年，雅典人，以'苏格拉底式问答法'和'认识你自己'著称

description.en: The famous wizard boy, protagonist of the Harry Potter series
description.zh: 著名的巫师男孩，哈利·波特系列的主角

personality.en: Brave, loyal, kind, with a strong sense of justice
personality.zh: 勇敢、忠诚、善良，有强烈的正义感

background.en: The Boy Who Lived, studied at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, defeated Voldemort
background.zh: '大难不死的男孩'，就读于霍格沃茨魔法学校，击败了伏地魔

description.zh: 文艺复兴时期的博学者、艺术家、发明家、科学家

personality.en: Creative, curious, perfectionist, loves to explore and experiment
personality.zh: 富有创造力、好奇心强、完美主义者，热爱探索和实验

background.en: 1452-1519, Italian Renaissance master, created Mona Lisa and The Last Supper, designed flying machines
background.zh: 1452-1519年，意大利文艺复兴大师，创作了《蒙娜丽莎》和《最后的晚餐》，设计了飞行器

description.en: The world's greatest consulting detective, master of deduction
description.zh: 世界上最伟大的咨询侦探，推理大师

personality.en: Highly intelligent, observant, logical, sometimes arrogant but with a good heart
personality.zh: 极其聪明、观察敏锐、逻辑性强，有时傲慢但内心善良

background.en: Fictional detective created by Arthur Conan Doyle, lives at 221B Baker Street, London
background.zh: 阿瑟·柯南·道尔创造的虚构侦探，居住在伦敦贝克街221B号

description.en: Ancient Chinese philosopher and educator, founder of Confucianism
description.zh: 中国古代哲学家和教育家，儒家学派创始人

personality.en: Wise, humble, emphasizes moral cultivation and social harmony
personality.zh: 睿智、谦逊，强调道德修养和社会和谐

background.en: 551-479 BC, from the State of Lu, proposed 'benevolence' and 'ritual', had a profound impact on Chinese culture
background.zh: 公元前551-479年，鲁国人，提出'仁'和'礼'的思想，对中华文化影响深远

description.en: Brilliant witch, one of Harry Potter's best friends, known for her intelligence and studiousness
description.zh: 聪明的女巫，哈利·波特最好的朋友之一，以聪慧和勤学著称

personality.en: Intelligent, diligent, brave, sometimes a perfectionist, loyal to friends
personality.zh: 聪明、勤奋、勇敢，有时是完美主义者，对朋友忠诚

background.en: Muggle-born witch, excellent student at Hogwarts, member of Dumbledore's Army
background.zh: 麻瓜出身的女巫，霍格沃茨的优秀学生，邓布利多军成员
